recipe.title: Ice Cream Sundaes with Chocolate-Coffee Sauce
ingredients: 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons Homemade Coffee-Flavored Liqueur or Kahlúa plus additional for passing
instructions: Combine chocolate, liqueur, and whipping cream in heavy small saucepan. Whisk over medium heat until melted and smooth. Scoop ice cream into dessert dishes or goblets. Spoon warm sauce over. Serve, passing additional liqueur.
Combine chocolate, liqueur, and whipping cream in heavy small saucepan. Whisk over medium heat until melted and smooth.
Scoop ice cream into dessert dishes or goblets. Spoon warm sauce over. Serve, passing additional liqueur.
